entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17 except minus 23 in low lying areas.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
